meanings.definition: Mail sent by airplane for faster delivery.
meanings.sent1: I sent a letter via airmail to my pen pal in another country.
meanings.sent2: The airmail service is popular for sending urgent documents quickly.
meanings.sent3: The airmail flew faster than a speeding car!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like airmail, reaching him swiftly and directly.
meanings.sent5: The airmail package zoomed through the sky like a shooting star.

meanings.definition: To send mail by airplane for faster delivery.
meanings.sent1: I will airmail the important documents to the office tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She airmails letters to her family overseas every month.
meanings.sent3: He airmails his love letters to his girlfriend with a touch of drama.
meanings.sent4: The news was airmailing around the world at lightning speed.
meanings.sent5: The urgent message was airmailing its way to the recipient in record time.
